channel.title: Need a little help with somthing1
channel.description: :confused: hello people im in need of help i need to know how to get my server up and runnig with the chosen ip i have made and so my probelm is i need to know how to get my server up and runing with the ip i have made ?? pl0x could you help me??? :confused:

item.title: Need a little help with somthing1
item.dc:creator: @soadfreek409 soadfreek409
item.description:
@soadfreek409 wrote:

[quote=“dannate, post:5, topic:81990”]i have but i dont understand it i have an ip address and a server souce i dont know how to get my server up and running by my ip address that my question/[/quote]If you got an ip from No-IP already you need to log into your router and set up port-forwarding. So, double click your internet connection at the bottom right hand corner of your screen. Then click support and write down the IP it says. Log into your router by typing http://(theipyouwrotedown) in an internet browser. I’m not sure which Router you have, but mine has a tab that say Applications & Gaming you click that. First, you type the name of your port doesn’t really matter what it is… Second, you add the port numbers both should be the same number. Lastly, you type the last part of the ip you wrote down in the last box you can type in. Then save. compile and run!

Also, you might have to add the port into your firewall so go to Control Panel/Security Center/Windows Firewall/exceptions/add port/ then add the port you put in your router for port-forwarding…

I know it’s confusing, but if you follow along carefully you’ll get it…

Read full topic
item.source: Need a little help with somthing1

item.title: Need a little help with somthing1
item.dc:creator: @soadfreek409 soadfreek409
item.description:
@soadfreek409 wrote:

[quote=“x pipstor x, post:2, topic:81990”]hamachi is easier…just download hamachi…and make some networks…then run server and it will be up[/quote]Hamachi may be easier, but you might not get many people online since Moparscape doesn’t really want Hamachi servers on the Current Server List. [quote=“dannate, post:1, topic:81990”] hello people im in need of help i need to know how to get my server up and runnig with the chosen ip i have made and so my probelm is i need to know how to get my server up and runing with the ip i have made ?? pl0x could you help me??? [/quote]I would take a look at Mod Tarahoks Ultimate Server guide under the Tutorials thread. It is very helpful.

Read full topic
